com.quinsoft.zeidon.domains

Class Base64BlobDomain

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.quinsoft.zeidon.domains.AbstractDomain
      • com.quinsoft.zeidon.domains.BlobDomain
        • com.quinsoft.zeidon.domains.Base64BlobDomain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Domain

    public class Base64BlobDomain
extends BlobDomain
    A version of the Blob domain that uses Base64 for getString() and setting from a string.
